ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
//重定向和导入书架处理
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) {
	book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(baseUrl.replace(/,{or.+/,''))},{"type":"bax"}`;
	//注意入库origin
	}

let nn=getsurl();

//发书评功能
let bkbl = book.getVariable("custom");
//解书籍地址
let ml = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let [, bkid=''] = mlj.match(/book\/(\d+)/)||[];
//↑获取书id
java.put('bkid',bkid);

if (bkbl=='🔒'||bkbl=='') {
//带🔒或书籍变量为空会经过这里
//处理加书架功能
let sj=java.get('sj');
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
if (sj=='2'&&sj2=='1') {tbshujia(nn,bkid)&&java.put('sj',3);}
else if (sj=='1') {java.put('sj',2);}

} else if (bkbl=='目录') {
	//清空最新章储存强制刷新目录
	java.put('8xzx','');
	//清空输入的书籍变量
	book.putCustomVariable('');
} else {
let pfurl = nn+'/modules/article/rating.php';
let plurl = nn+'/modules/article/reviews.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()||'';
let cki = ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''];
tk = cki[1];
//↑获取链接和tk

if (bkid != '' && tk != '') {
let tm = new Date().getTime();
let bkfs = (bkbl.match(/^(\d|10)分$/) || ['','0'])[1];
let pfbody = `score=${bkfs}&id=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;
let plbody = `ptitle=&act=newpost&jieqi_token=${tk}&Submit=&pcontent=${bkbl}&aid=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;

let headers = gethd();
headers['Referer']=mlj;
headers["Cookie"]=ck;
let url='',body='';
if (bkfs != 0) {url=pfurl;body=pfbody;}
else {url=plurl;body=plbody;}
//清空输入的书籍变量
book.putCustomVariable('');
let by = java.connect(url+','+JSON.stringify(
    	{"method": "POST",
    	"header":headers,
    	"body":body})
    	).body();
java.longToast("\n"+java.htmlFormat(by));
//随机延时0-1秒
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*1001);
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);
cache.deleteMemory('baxxq'+bkid);
	} else if (tk == '') {java.toast('未登录');}
}

//先发评论再访问刷新
if (!i) {
	//跳转时，src为源码
	let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(src);
	//不要直接访问tt
	tt=String(tt).replace(/http.{4}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
	const startTime=new Date().getTime();
	result = cache.getFromMemory('baxxq'+bkid) || java.ajax(nn+tt+','+JSON.stringify(option))+'';
	const endTime=new Date().getTime();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	if (speed>39) {java.toast('\n详情页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');}	
}
	java.setContent(result);

//内容判断
let name=java.getString('class.divbox cf@span.0@text||.mbs@ownText')+[];
name=name.replace(/^《|》$/g,'');
let author=java.getString('class.divbox cf@span.1@a@text')+[];
if (author=='')
[,author]=(gets(".gray@ownText").match(/^(.+) 著/))||[];
if (name) {
	cache.putMemory('baxxq'+bkid,result);
	book.name=String(book.name)||name;
	book.author=String(book.author)||author;
//放入书名
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
//放入ID和书名。正式版该语法会报错
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});

	if (book.name!=name) {
			let sm=source.get('8xsm'),sm1=java.get('sm1');
			//sm功能标记，sm1判断标记
			if (sm1=='') {
			//书名不同，仅记录
			java.put('sm1',1);
			} else if (sm=='1') {
				book.name=name;
				java.toast("已自动更新书名");
			} else if (sm1=='1') {
				java.longToast("详情页获取的书名：\n《"+name+"》");
				java.log("书名："+name);
				java.put('sm1',2);
			}
			
}	else if (book.author!=author) {
	// book.author=author;
	//仅输出日志
java.log("获取的作者不同，作者："+author);}
	
	//书名和作者正常由此过
	}
else {
	//书名加载失败
	gengxin();
	java.toast("详情页加载失败，请刷新重试");
}
	result
</js>
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
<js>
let zxe=gete(".divbox h3 a||span:contains(最新：)+a");
let zxh=zxe.attr("href").replaceAll("http.{4}[^\\/]+",'');
let zx = java.get('8xzx');
if (zx==zxh) java.put('ww',0);
else {java.put('8xzx',zxh);java.put('ww',1);}
java.put("8xzxt",zxe.text())
</js>
ruleBookInfo.wordCount:
<js>
let r1=`{{@@.tabcontent .tabvalue.1@html##全文字数：(\d+)##$1###}}`;
let r2=`{{@@.gray@ownText##(\d{2,})字##$1###}}`;
r1||r2
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##(?:\s|^)本站发布页.{0,9}8xsk.org|8xsk.org(?=\s|$)|八叉书库|八叉~书库|八叉书[,~]库|(?:833330|8xsk|八叉)([^\.])(?:xyz|yxz|org|书库)|八~叉|书~库##$1

ruleExplore.author:
<js>
if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?'))
result=java.getString(source.ruleSearch.author+[])+'';
else if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl()))
result = gets("td.2@text||span:contains(作者：)+span@text");
else
result = gets('td.1@a.-1@span@ownText').replace(/^\//,'')||gets(".gray@textNodes").replace(/.+\ \|\ |\n.*/g,'');

if (result == '[email protected]') {
	let hex = java.getString('.__cf_email__.0@data-cfemail')+'';
	result = decodeEmail(hex,0);
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	java.put('sj',3); //标识已经同步了书架，作者名称读取缓存
	let sj=source.get('sj'+java.get('bkid'));
	result=sj.split(',')[0]||'';
	}
	result
</js>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('http://localhost') ) {
		result = [];
}
else if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {
let r1 = java.getString('#content .blockcontent@text');
if (r1.includes("错误原因")) {java.longToast(r1);result = [];}
else {result = java.getElement('#jieqi_page_contents>div');}
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/book/') ){
java.toast('暂不支持重定向结果');
result=[];
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	//我的书架
		let ts= java.getString('table@caption@ownText||#jieqi_page_contents@ownText');
	ts=String(ts).replace(/.*(可收藏 .+已收藏[^，。]+).*$/,'\n$1');
	source.get('sjts')!=ts&&ts&&java.toast('\n'+ts);
	source.put('sjts',ts);
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(100);
	if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl()))
	result = java.getElement('table tr:has(a)');
	else result = java.getElements('#content div[class="c_row cf"]');
	}
else {
result = java.getElements('#jieqi_page_contents>tr||#content div[class="c_row cf"]');
}
result
</js>
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let jhf=source.get('8xjhf'), img;
if (jhf=='1') img=jinghuafm();
else {
//正常封面
if (/articlelist|sort\//.test(baseUrl)) {
	//含有封面，注意“sort”
	img = java.getString('img@src');
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {
	//搜索
	img = java.getString(String(source.ruleSearch.coverUrl));
	}
else{
	//拼接封面
	let id = java.get('bkid')+'', n;
  if (id < 1000) n = 0;
  else n = id.slice(0,-3);
img = `https://image.8xsk.org/${n}/${id}/${id}s.jpg`;
}
img=gethdi(img);
}
img
</js>
ruleExplore.intro:
<js>
if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?'))
result=java.getString(source.ruleSearch.intro+[])+'';
else if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl()))
result = gets('td.3@text||.c_description@text');
else
result = gets('td.2@text')||gets(".gray@textNodes").match(/\n(.+)/)[1];
if (baseUrl.includes("top/words")) {'⠀\n字数：'+(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万'}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/goodnum")) {'⠀\n收藏数：'+result}
//新书榜
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/newhot")) {
	result = result>9999 ? 	(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万' : result;
	'⠀\n点击数：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/signtime")) {
  let t = parseInt(result)*1000;
  let time = java.timeFormatUTC(t,"⠀\n签约时间：yy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss",8*60*60*1000);
  time}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/lastupdate")) {'⠀\n字数：'+(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万'}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/postdate")) {'⠀\n入库时间：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/allvisit")) {
	result = result>999 ? 	(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万' : result;
	'⠀\n总点击：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/monthvisit")) {
	result = result>999 ? 	(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万' : result;
	'⠀\n月点击：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/weekvisit")) {
	result = result>9999 ? 	(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万' : result;
	'⠀\n周点击：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/allvote")) {'⠀\n总推荐：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/monthvote")) {'⠀\n月推荐：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/weekvote")) {'⠀\n周推荐：'+result}
else if (/articlelist|sort\/|search\.php/.test(baseUrl)) {
//含简介(搜索会经此)
result.replace('「','“').replace('」','”').replace(/\s+/g,' ')}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	let sj=source.get('sj'+java.get('bkid'));
	sj=sj.split(',')[1]||'';
	(sj==''||sj=='null')?'':'\u200b\n当前阅读进度：'+sj;
	}
else {''}
</js>
ruleExplore.kind:
<js>
if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {java.getStringList(String(source.ruleSearch.kind));}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	java.getStringList('td.4@text');}
else {java.getStringList('td[4,5]@text||span:contains(更新：)+span@text');}
</js>
ruleExplore.lastChapter:
<js>
if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {	java.getString(String(source.ruleSearch.lastChapter));}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
gets('td.2@a.-1@text||h4+.gray:containsOwn(最新：)>a@text');}
else if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl())){
gets('td.1@a.-1@text||class.c_subject@a.-1@text');}
else {}
</js>
ruleExplore.name:
<js>
let rs='';
if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {
result=String(java.getString('.c_subject@text||h4@text')).replace(/\"/g,'');
//获取id目的
rs = java.getString('a.0@href');
}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	result =  java.getString('td.1@a.-1@text||h4@a@text');
	rs = java.getString('td.1@a.-1@href||h4@a@href');
	//我的书架需要转化链接
	rs=getsurl()+'/book/'+rs.match(/aid=(\d+)/)[1]+'.html';
}
else {
		result =  gets('td.0@a.-1@text||class.c_subject@a.1@text||h4@text')||gets('td.1@a.-1@ownText');
	rs = java.getString('td.0@a.-1@href||class.c_subject@a.1@href||class.db cf@href||td.1@a.-1@href');
}

//获取id，黑名单时书名为空
let id = (rs.match(/book\/(\d+)/)||['',''])[1];
java.put('bkid',id);
let i = hmdjib(id,result);
if (i) result='';
else book.bookUrl=`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(rs)},{"type":""}`;
result
</js>
ruleExplore.wordCount:
<js>
if (/articlelist|sort\//.test(baseUrl)) {
  java.getString('span:contains(字数：)+span@text');
}
else if (/articlefilter/.test(baseUrl)) {
	if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl()))
	java.getString('td.3@text');
	else java.getString('td.2@text');
}
else if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {	java.getString(String(source.ruleSearch.wordCount));
	}
</js>

ruleSearch.author:
<js>
gets("span:contains(作者：)+span@text")||gets(".gray@text").match(/(^.+)\ \|/)[1];
</js>
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let r1 = java.getString('#content .blockcontent@text');
if (r1.includes("错误原因")) {java.longToast(r1);result=[];}
else {
	result = java.getElement('#jieqi_page_contents>div');
}
result
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let nn = getsurl();
let url = `${nn}/modules/article/search.php`;
if (key.startsWith('书名：'))
url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=articlename&page=${page}`;
else if (key.startsWith('作者：'))
url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=author&page=${page}`;
else if (key.startsWith('标签：'))
url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=keywords&page=${page}`;
else
url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`;
let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
url+','+JSON.stringify(option);
</js>
variableComment:
♦书籍变量：
　 ①填写  🔒 并刷新，关闭本书评论显示
　 ②填写“目录”并刷新，强制刷新目录
　 ③填写分数并刷新，使用分数进行评分
　 ④填写其它并刷新，内容作为评论发送
分数格式示意“1分”“2分”…“10分”

㊟默认详情页检测到有更新内容时才会刷新目录

！注意区分源变量和书籍变量
